securitySection.title: Security Transparency

points.point1: Only your password is securely protected.
points.point2: Other account information (such as name, email) is not guaranteed to be secure.
points.point3: Chat/Conversation Content: The privacy of all conversation content is not guaranteed.
points.point4: Conversas may accidentally become accessible or visible to third parties.

securitySection.criticalWarning: Important Alert: Do not enter personal or confidential information in the chat. Use this service at your own risk.
